onboardingTitle1: Best Home Furniture For Your Room

onboardingSubtitle2: Match furniture with your room’s aesthetics easily.
onboardingSubtitle3: Your dream furniture delivered within 24 hours.

welcomeMessage: Welcome to Bella - Modern Furniture Store
introduction: These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Bella’s application.
acceptanceOfTermsDescription: By accessing or using Bella, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not use our service.
purchasesAndPaymentsDescription: Bella offers a wide range of modern furniture products. All payments are processed securely, and you agree to provide accurate payment information.
deliveryPolicyDescription: Orders will be processed and shipped according to our delivery policy. Bella is not responsible for delays caused by external factors.
returnsAndRefundsDescription: You can return products in accordance with our return and refund policy. Products must be in original condition and returned within the specified period.
userConductDescription: Users agree not to misuse the app by engaging in prohibited activities such as fraud, harassment, or unauthorized access to the app’s resources.
privacyPolicyDescription: Bella respects your privacy. Please read our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
changesToTermsDescription: Bella reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the app after changes implies acceptance of the revised terms.
contactMessage: If you have any questions or concerns about these terms, please contact us at support@bella.com.
howToTrackOrder: How do I track my order?
trackOrderAnswer: You can track your order status from the Orders section in your account. You will also receive notifications via email.
returnPolicyAnswer: You can return items within 30 days of purchase. Items must be in original condition with all packaging intact.
contactSupportQuestion: How do I contact customer support?
contactSupportAnswer: You can contact us via email at support@bella.com or call our customer service hotline.
feedbackPrompt: We value your feedback. Please let us know your thoughts:
appDescription: This application is a modern furniture store. This is the official app of the Bella Company.
